items.sentence: Please remove your shoes before entering the house.
The only kind of music Tom listens to is punk rock.
Do you think that you could swim across this river?
When Tom speaks French, he makes a lot of mistakes.
Tom doesn't know French well enough to do that job.
When I first moved to Boston, I didn't know anyone.
Tom grew up in Boston, but now he lives in Chicago.
It isn't as difficult to learn French as you think.
It's people like you that ruin things for everyone.
It's times like this that people like us need help.
